articles.description: Baldwin returns to the head coaching chair which he occupied for two years from 2015 to 2016.

articles.title: Fire in North Bridge Road flat: 5 taken to hospital, 120 evacuated - AsiaOne
articles.description: Five people were taken to hospital after a fire in North Bridge Road on Saturday (June 12) night. A Singapore Civil Defence Force (SCDF) spokesman said it was alerted to the blaze at Block 8 at about 10.15pm. The fire involved contents of a seventh-floor unit…
